name: Survival Shooter PPAP
description:
A small child who is actually dreaming but he can control his dream but it's not a fun thing because he has to fight zombies that are cute but scary for him. 

This game is intended only to fulfill a task (Pengantar Pengembangan Aplikasi Permainan) and a continuation of a project at Dilo academy when I was on vacation last semester

Controls:
WASD - movement (walk front, left, back, right)
Mouse movement - Rotate camera / look around
Mouse left click - Shooting

if the game ends, wait a few seconds to restart the game
